mapper.select: select detail_id, resume_id, basic_info, education_info, work_experience, project_experience, skills, certificates, self_evaluation, attachment_url, create_time, update_time from tb_resume_detail where resume_id = #{resumeId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_resume_detail ( resume_id, basic_info, education_info, work_experience, project_experience, skills, certificates, self_evaluation, attachment_url, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{resumeId}, #{basicInfo}, #{educationInfo}, #{workExperience}, #{projectExperience}, #{skills}, #{certificates}, #{selfEvaluation}, #{attachmentUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
